line.comment: * no dead factions, no Player before his first sector and no Yaki before their revolution
* rubberbanding spec bonus for main factions based on comparison with Terraformers
* first we reset all strategy adjustments
* FREIGHTERS - how many % of our previous ships did we loose recently?
* resource reserve 0 = starving, 1 = bad, 2 = medium, 3 = good
* territory size comparison to other commonwealth factions
* military power comparison to other commonwealth factions
* OCV portal distance comparison to other commonwealth factions
* we are much too small and switch into panic mode
* we are small and need to be careful
* we are undisputed and can be reckless
* we are large and can be confident
* enemy strength exceeds 40% of our total fleet power! (panic mode)
* enemy strength exceeds 20% of our total fleet power!
*example: Khaak Queen raid has about 20 average ship power
* secondary enemies are so weak that we can be more aggressive in the faction war
*if we didn't loose freighters we cannot have a pirate problem!
* how many pirates would be appropriate vs. reality
* we order extra Police squadrons if we have resources or the pirates are really troublesome, alternatively cheaper Escorts
*pirates trouble us so much that we generally get more cautious and want peace
* minimum Xenon size and OCV strength before anyone bothers
*our sectors are very close to the OCV portal
*OCV strength is always much more important

sval.val: no dead factions, no Player before his first sector and no Yaki before their revolution
rubberbanding spec bonus for main factions based on comparison with Terraformers
first we reset all strategy adjustments
FREIGHTERS - how many % of our previous ships did we loose recently?
resource reserve 0 = starving, 1 = bad, 2 = medium, 3 = good
territory size comparison to other commonwealth factions
military power comparison to other commonwealth factions
OCV portal distance comparison to other commonwealth factions
we are much too small and switch into panic mode
we are small and need to be careful
we are undisputed and can be reckless
we are large and can be confident
enemy strength exceeds 40% of our total fleet power! (panic mode)
enemy strength exceeds 20% of our total fleet power!
example: Khaak Queen raid has about 20 average ship power
secondary enemies are so weak that we can be more aggressive in the faction war
if we didn't loose freighters we cannot have a pirate problem!
how many pirates would be appropriate vs. reality
we order extra Police squadrons if we have resources or the pirates are really troublesome, alternatively cheaper Escorts
pirates trouble us so much that we generally get more cautious and want peace
minimum Xenon size and OCV strength before anyone bothers
our sectors are very close to the OCV portal
OCV strength is always much more important
